类的使用
org.springframework.core.io.support.ResourceRegion

  • 使用ResourceRegion的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.core.codec
    Encoder and Decoder abstractions to convert between a reactive stream of bytes and Java objects.
    org.springframework.http
    Contains a basic abstraction over client/server-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.http.converter
    Provides an HttpMessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and HTTP input/output messages.

    • org.springframework.core.codec中ResourceRegion的使用

      类型变量类型为ResourceRegion的org.springframework.core.codec中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<DataBuffer> ResourceRegionEncoder.encode(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends ResourceRegion> input, DataBufferFactory bufferFactory, ResolvableType elementType, MimeType mimeType, Map<String,Object> hints) 

    • org.springframework.http中ResourceRegion的使用

      返回ResourceRegion的org.springframework.http中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ResourceRegion HttpRange.toResourceRegion(Resource resource)
      Turn a Resource into a ResourceRegion using the range information contained in the current HttpRange.
      返回变量类型为ResourceRegion的类型的org.springframework.http中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static List<ResourceRegion> HttpRange.toResourceRegions(List<HttpRange> ranges, Resource resource)
      Convert each HttpRange into a ResourceRegion, selecting the appropriate segment of the given Resource using HTTP Range information.
